website_summaries.verdict: New Balance may have been known for their cutting-edge models and their golf shoe line-up keeps up with its reputation. The New Balance Sweeper not only highlights its classic styling but its presence on the turf as well. This shoe satisfies the needs of both newbies and aggressive swingers, given that they both attain comfort, traction, and protection throughout the entire round.
pros: Comfort is a stand out description among the reviews of the New Balance Sweeper
Having excellently shaped spikes, this model supplies adequate traction that holds even wet turf
Some players claim that it is easy to forget that this is a golf shoe because of its lightweight properties
The waterproof upper allows this version to be taken even on soggy grounds
This shoe is suitable for all-year-round wear, says several users
According to a few individuals, the extra room adds to the comfort experience of this shoe
One guarantees that the stability achieved from this version is unbeatable
cons: Some had issues with the heel counter being positioned too high and ripping after a few months of wear
One complains about the thinness of the insoles
The spikes can easily be felt at the bottoms of the feet

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy and flexible.
customer_reviews.text: These are incredibly comfortable. I'm normally a 13.5 and chose 14 wide because the last few styles I tried were tight and narrow on the sides and across the top. I could probably have gone for the regular width, but the extra room feels real good. Wearing these is like walking on marsh mellows. No break in required. Really soft, flexible and comfortable. Wore them out the box for 18 holes with no issues These are actually more comfortable than my running shoes. I was disappointed when I took them off and put my running shoes back on after golfing today.
customer_reviews.author: Stdb27

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, great looking shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. I ordered the same shoe in black a while ago. I usually wear an 11D. The 11 medium was a little tight. This one is an 11 wide. It fits perfectly and is very comfortably and looks great. I don't know about the waterproof aspect yet. It hasn't rained since I got them.
customer_reviews.author: GAD

customer_reviews.title: Good, comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: For the price, these are wonderful shoes. Hard to find ones that actually use soft spikes instead of relying on rubber soles for 100% of the grip page. Good fit and lightweight. Don’t WANT to test their water resistance but NB has always been a quality make, so I’m confident.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Onsted

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of trouble finding shoes that fit comfortably on my toe joint, particularly when playing golf. Generally New Balance work really well for me. And these are great (and so far they’ve kept my feet dry).
customer_reviews.author: FJLTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: interior is torn after a wearing a few times
customer_reviews.text: The golf shoes fit nicely but after less 2 months of wearing the inside is torn and I have to throw out the pair. I do walk with these but that is not a excuse.
customer_reviews.author: z

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but narrow
customer_reviews.text: Ordered double wide because wide which is what I normaly wear did not fit. The insoles come out but the shoes fit and feel better with the insoles that come with the shoes than mine. Initially the insoles came out but not after wearing them several times.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Dau

customer_reviews.title: Not as wide as expected
customer_reviews.text: If you're on the fence regarding what width to order, go with wider. I ordered a EE wide, which is usually fits me well, but these shoes were not wide enough. Had to send them back before wearing.
customer_reviews.author: Doug B.

customer_reviews.title: Stay dry
customer_reviews.text: It's a rainy day . The mind races. You think about your Golf shoes the only friend who hasn't betrayed you, the only friend who won't be dead by sun up. Sleep tight, mates, in your new balance sweeper golf shoes
customer_reviews.author: Raymond G.

customer_reviews.title: good fit and feel
customer_reviews.text: Likes: fit, feel, waterproof, price Dislikes: white only color for my size
customer_reviews.author: Bob the Job

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great price for New Balance shoes, recommended if you suffer from peripheral neuropathy.
customer_reviews.author: pokeyzon

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Received them Friday and went to the driving range for 2 hours. Played 18 on Saturday and 18 on Sunday. Comfortable, dry, and no “break in”. Hope they hold up for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Kara Satterfield

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoes
customer_reviews.text: Size is true. Very comfortable and good looking on and off the course.
customer_reviews.author: bhop4

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable that my husband forgot he was wearing gold shoes and wore them to work.
customer_reviews.author: DENISE TAYLOR

customer_reviews.title: Amazing comfort!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable right out of the box. Keeps feet dry from wet courses.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Walters

customer_reviews.title: Dry and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They fit perfectly and are super comfortable. I played a very soggy course and found they were waterproof as advertised. Good grip on the wet turf, too.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: golf shoes
customer_reviews.text: just a little stif, making it tough on the feet
customer_reviews.author: Margaret B Payne

customer_reviews.title: Best Golf Shoe I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: New Balance is reliable for quality and the best fit for my feet which are wide and have a high arch. Very comfortable and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Burt A. Chojnowski

customer_reviews.title: Pay attention to size when ordering
customer_reviews.text: This New Balance was more narrow than my previous New balance shoes. Very visible when both shoes were side by side. Make sure you order wide "W" if width is a concern.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Caradonna

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and fitting but not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking, comfortable and nice fitting shoe but not very waterproof. Disappointed in the lack of waterproofing. I play early in the morning with a heavy due but I was expecting better.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoe, but widyh runs small.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is well made. However width at 4e was tight and does not have much room for a high arch.
customer_reviews.author: Mooche 17

customer_reviews.title: Only New Balance!
customer_reviews.text: I went from box to golf course with total comfort. It totally met my expectations. Only New Balance!
customer_reviews.author: Larry R. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these and a pair in black to replace some old shoes. They came ahead of schedule and fit well, not to mention the good value
customer_reviews.author: Paul G.

customer_reviews.title: Didnt make a the year.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't owned them a year, bought them last August, yet and the entire outsole separated from the bottom of the shoe. Going to try to glue it back on until I can order a new pair(not these).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: most uncomfortable golf shoe ever
customer_reviews.text: The soles in these shoes are very thin or something. I can feel each spike through the sole. I even tried adding an insert. I would never buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Kay

customer_reviews.title: comfort
customer_reviews.text: I wear New Balance sneakers so I thought the golf shoes would be as comfortable and they are.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable, I played an extra 18 holes! New Balance are the best athletic shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Steven B.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for beat up feet
customer_reviews.text: 75 year old father in law loves them. Size 14 extra wide.
customer_reviews.author: S. Rissmiller

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Golf Shoe
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were ordered because of the 4E width. The shoes fit as advertised and provide good stability.
customer_reviews.author: David C. Pearce

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: They were uncomfortable after being halfway through the First round of golf
customer_reviews.author: Dave D

customer_reviews.title: Comfort right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes I normally wear size 12.5 but these size 13 fit very well.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: New Balance Shoes
customer_reviews.text: They were true to size. Shoe was extremely comfortable and waterproof. Excellent value!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Good Looking!
customer_reviews.text: Playing golf with my friends! They are jealous of the shoes and the price!
customer_reviews.author: thomas davey

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love the arch support. And you had extra wide! I love the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: BOB MUSSER

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy
customer_reviews.text: Great fit right out of the box. Very comfy. Great value for 2-year waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: CraigM

customer_reviews.title: Shoes were comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Shoes were comfortable and didn't need a "breakin" period on first time wearing them
customer_reviews.author: Louis Mauro

customer_reviews.title: VERY COMFORTABLE
customer_reviews.text: The shoe fits very well and feels very comfortable and snug.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Sances

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: Like the comfort and looks of the shoe for golf.
customer_reviews.author: gerald  terry

product_meta.title: New Balance Men's Sweeper Golf Shoe
product_meta.description: Brush away the competition with New Balance® Golf and the Sweeper golf shoe! Plush, faux-leather upper in a low-top silhouette. Traditional lace-up closure. Padded tongue and collar for added support. Textile lining. Cush+® insole delivers supportive comfort. REVlite® midsole provides a responsive feel and superior shock absorption. NDurance® spikeless rubber outsole. FastTwist 3.0 cleat system®. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 14.4 oz Product measurements were taken using size 12, width 4E - Extra Wide. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
feature_bullets: REVlite 10mm drop* midsole provides lightweight cushioning & premium responsiveness
NDurance rubber outsole with removable FTS 3.0 Pulsar spikes
